module.name: ngs
module.description: Extension to Observ-OM to support Next Gen Sequencing projects using the Illumina platform. Each work consists of NgsStudy having one or more NgsSample. These samples are then put on a= FlowcellLane, optionally with barcode.

entity.name: NgsStudy
entity.description: An NgsProject bundles information about one study

field.name: NoLanes
field.description: Number of lanes planned in this study

field.name: NoSamples
field.description: Number of samples planned in this study

field.name: sampletype
field.description: Type of sample (dna/rna). Will become ontologyReference

field.name: externalIdentifier
field.description: (Optional) alternative sample identifier as known by sample supplier

entity.name: Flowcell
entity.description: A Flowcell is a unit of measuremnt, currently, 8 lanes measurement on the Illumina Genome Analyzer

field.name: machine
field.description: The Illumina machine it was run on

field.name: run
field.description: The run number (string), always use 4 digits (with leading 0's)

field.name: startDate
field.description: The date the flowcell was run on the machine

entity.name: LibraryLane
entity.description: This is actually our worksheet. Name is typically library name, or of there is only one sample per library it may be sample name. Description of the sample library that has been measured on a flowcell. A lane is one lane on the Illumina Genome Analyzer. At this point, the library entity is not traced seperately. Optionally, a sample is barcoded.

field.name: flowcell
field.description: The flowcell to which this lane belongs

field.name: lane
field.description: The lane number that is unique within a flow cell. In range 1-8

field.name: barcode
field.description: multiple samples can be on one flowcell using barcodes

field.name: sample
field.description: The sample which is measured on this lane+library combination.

unique.description: Lane and barcode is unique per flowcell

field.name: name
field.description: The nucleotide sequence which forms the barcode
